title: Capital Punishment
description: Capital Punishment is a TTW experience focused on plentiful gameplay changes, graphical fidelity, and bringing roleplay elements to the Mojave & Capital Wastelands all whilst preserving or improving upon the many features we love from the original games. Explore these two wastelands in a new fashion with a plethora of new weapons, locations, player homes, graphic enhancements, bug fixes, balancing changes, & much more (all carefully integrated together to create a cohesive experience). For those who love hardcore, take on the challenge and enjoy difficult but rewarding gameplay. For those who just want to hangout and play in a more casual style, we offer this too! As one of the more longstanding and versatile lists on the New Vegas Wabbajack category, we offer an experience for all fans of the Fallout franchise!
author: TheMrNewVegas
